long.en:
ğŸ‘‰ Temuâ„¢ Seller Assistant is a convenient tool designed for temu sellers. It has two powerful functions: automatically add to the delivery platform and one-click clear pop-up window and one-click automatic listing
ğŸ’» The plug-in runs directly in your browser, without downloading or installing additional software. Even without programming skills, you can easily use this plug-in to improve your work efficiency.
FeaturesğŸ’¡ğŸ’¡ğŸ’¡ 
Temuâ„¢ Seller Assistant Plugin provides the following features
  * Inject tool button on temu seller backend pageï¼›
  * automatically add to the delivery platform;
  * Clear the piles of pop-ups with one clickï¼›
  * One-click automatic listing, switching between multiple storesï¼›
  * Help you improve work efficiencyã€‚
ğŸ”” How to start using it?
1. Install the plug-in and access the temu seller backend;
2. Click the injected tool button;
3. Click the Remove Notification button to clear the pop-up window with one click
4. Click the collection box button to view the newly created product information. If there is no product information in the collection box, the user needs to go to the new product page to create a batch of products. The plug-in will save the user's newly created product information to the collection box for subsequent automatic listing of products.
5. On the My Stock List page, click the Automatically Add to Shipment button to start automatically adding to the shipment.
Thank you for choosing the Temuâ„¢ Seller Backend Assistant plugin. Let us improve our work efficiency together!
